revised_title: Correcting Newton's Error on Precession of the Equinoxes
tldr: The author, Abram Robertson, critiques Sir Isaac Newton's estimation of the precession of the equinoxes due to a mistake in his process. He investigates the principles of compound rotatory motion and calculates the disturbing solar force on the spheroidal figure of the earth, leading to a more accurate estimation of the angular velocity and annual precession.
